publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4748 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Remit—That the Parliament agrees that the remit of the Communities Committee be amended to— To consider and report on matters relating to housing and area regeneration, poverty, voluntary sector issues and charity law; matters relating to the land use planning system and building standards; such other matters as fall within the responsibility of the Minister for Communities; and health promotion and nutrition in schools. Supported by: George Lyon*
